title: 进自己开的服出现这个问题 求解答
author: lixiang87834
txt_content:
C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\QQ截图20130224115027.jpg Minecraft has crashed!            ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Code Chicken Core

A full error report has been saved to F:\TDDOWNLOAD\MineCraft-1.4.7-Client\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-24_12.08.11-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(
